metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7981 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in valider_xml.php in SPIP 3.1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the var_url parameter in a valider_xml action.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7981` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.1.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.3-1').
